verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת <S%H5058><s%> on Neginoth מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <S%H238><s%> Give ear אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> to my prayer וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֝תְעַלַּ֗ם <S%H5956><s%> and hide מִתְּחִנָּתִֽי׃ <S%H8467><s%> not thyself from my supplication

הַקְשִׁ֣יבָה <S%H7181><s%> Attend לִּ֣י וַעֲנֵ֑נִי <S%H6030><s%> unto me and hear אָרִ֖יד <S%H7300><s%> me I mourn בְּשִׂיחִ֣י <S%H7879><s%> in my complaint וְאָהִֽימָה׃ <S%H1949><s%> and make a noise

מִקּ֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Because of the voice אוֹיֵ֗ב <S%H341><s%> of the enemy מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> because עָקַ֣ת <S%H6125><s%> of the oppression רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָמִ֥יטוּ <S%H4131><s%> for they cast עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> and אָ֝֗וֶן <S%H205><s%> iniquity וּבְאַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> upon me and in wrath יִשְׂטְמֽוּנִי׃ <S%H7852><s%> they hate

לִ֭בִּי <S%H3820><s%> My heart יָחִ֣יל <S%H2342><s%> is sore pained בְּקִרְבִּ֑י <S%H7130><s%> within וְאֵימ֥וֹת <S%H367><s%> me and the terrors מָ֝֗וֶת <S%H4194><s%> of death נָפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> are fallen עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and
יִרְאָ֣ה <S%H3374><s%> Fearfulness וָ֭רַעַד <S%H7461><s%> and trembling יָ֣בֹא <S%H935><s%> are come בִ֑י וַ֝תְּכַסֵּ֗נִי <S%H3680><s%> hath overwhelmed פַּלָּצֽוּת׃ <S%H6427><s%> upon me and horror

וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> And I said מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> I יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> Oh that לִּ֣י אֵ֭בֶר <S%H83><s%> I had wings כַּיּוֹנָ֗ה <S%H3123><s%> like a dove אָע֥וּפָה <S%H5774><s%> [for then] would I fly away וְאֶשְׁכֹּֽנָה׃ <S%H7931><s%> and be at rest

הִ֭נֵּה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אַרְחִ֣יק <S%H7368><s%> far off נְדֹ֑ד <S%H5074><s%> Lo [then] would I wander אָלִ֖ין <S%H3885><s%> [and] remain בַּמִּדְבָּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah
אָחִ֣ישָׁה <S%H2363><s%> I would hasten מִפְלָ֣ט <S%H4655><s%> my escape לִ֑י מֵר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> from the windy סֹעָ֣ה <S%H5584><s%> storm מִסָּֽעַר׃ <S%H5591><s%> [and] tempest

בַּלַּ֣ע <S%H1104><s%> Destroy אֲ֭דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> O Lord פַּלַּ֣ג <S%H6385><s%> [and] divide לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <S%H3956><s%> their tongues כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רָאִ֨יתִי <S%H7200><s%> for I have seen חָמָ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> violence וְרִ֣יב <S%H7379><s%> and strife בָּעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> in the city

יוֹמָ֤ם <S%H3119><s%> Day וָלַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and night יְסוֹבְבֻ֥הָ <S%H5437><s%> they go about עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> her upon חוֹמֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H2346><s%> it upon the walls וְאָ֖וֶן <S%H205><s%> thereof mischief וְעָמָ֣ל <S%H5999><s%> also and sorrow בְּקִרְבָּֽהּ׃ <S%H7130><s%> [are] in the midst

הַוּ֥וֹת <S%H1942><s%> Wickedness בְּקִרְבָּ֑הּ <S%H7130><s%> [is] in the midst וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָמִ֥ישׁ <S%H4185><s%> depart מֵ֝רְחֹבָ֗הּ <S%H7339><s%> not from her streets תֹּ֣ךְ <S%H8496><s%> thereof deceit וּמִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> and guile

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor אוֹיֵ֥ב <S%H341><s%> For [it was] not an enemy יְחָֽרְפֵ֗נִי <S%H2778><s%> [that] reproached וְאֶ֫שָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> me then I could have borne לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor מְ֭שַׂנְאִי <S%H8130><s%> [it] neither [was it] he that hated עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> against הִגְדִּ֑יל <S%H1431><s%> me [that] did magnify וְאֶסָּתֵ֥ר <S%H5641><s%> [himself] against me then I would have hid מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at
וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> But [it was] thou a man כְּעֶרְכִּ֑י <S%H6187><s%> mine equal אַ֝לּוּפִ֗י <S%H441><s%> my guide וּמְיֻדָּֽעִי׃ <S%H3045><s%> and mine acquaintance

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יַ֭חְדָּו <S%H3162><s%> together נַמְתִּ֣יק <S%H4985><s%> We took sweet ס֑וֹד <S%H5475><s%> counsel בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God נְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> [and] walked בְּרָֽגֶשׁ׃ <S%H7285><s%> in company

[יַשִּׁימָוֶת כ] (יַשִּׁ֤י ק) (מָ֨וֶת <S%H3451><s%> let death seize ק) עָלֵ֗ימוֹ <S%H5921><s%> upon יֵרְד֣וּ <S%H3381><s%> upon them [and] let them go down שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> into hell חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> quick כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For רָע֖וֹת <S%H7451><s%> for wickedness בִּמְגוּרָ֣ם <S%H4033><s%> [is] in their dwellings בְּקִרְבָּֽם׃ <S%H7130><s%> [and] among
אֲ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> I אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> upon אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> upon God אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> As for me I will call וַ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD יוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3467><s%> shall save

עֶ֤רֶב <S%H6153><s%> Evening וָבֹ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> and morning וְ֭צָהֳרַיִם <S%H6672><s%> and at noon אָשִׂ֣יחָה <S%H7878><s%> will I pray וְאֶהֱמֶ֑ה <S%H1993><s%> and cry aloud וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> and he shall hear קוֹלִֽי׃ <S%H6963><s%> my voice

פָּ֘דָ֤ה <S%H6299><s%> He hath delivered בְשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> my soul מִקֲּרָב־ <S%H7128><s%> from the battle לִ֑י כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בְ֝רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> [that was] against me for there were many הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5978><s%> against

יִשְׁמַ֤ע ׀ <S%H8085><s%> shall hear אֵ֨ל ׀ <S%H410><s%> God וְֽיַעֲנֵם֮ <S%H6031><s%> defile וְיֹ֤שֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> them even he that abideth קֶ֗דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of old סֶ֥לָה <S%H5542><s%> Selah אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there חֲלִיפ֣וֹת <S%H2487><s%> Because they have no changes לָ֑מוֹ וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not יָרְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> therefore they fear אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> not God

שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> He hath put forth יָ֭דָיו <S%H3027><s%> his hands בִּשְׁלֹמָ֗יו <S%H7965><s%> against such as be at peace חִלֵּ֥ל <S%H2490><s%> with him he hath broken בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1285><s%> his covenant

חָלְק֤וּ ׀ <S%H2505><s%> were smoother מַחְמָאֹ֣ת <S%H4260><s%> than butter פִּיו֮ <S%H6310><s%> [The words] of his mouth וּֽקֲרָב־ <S%H7128><s%> but war לִ֫בּ֥וֹ <S%H3820><s%> [was] in his heart רַכּ֖וּ <S%H7401><s%> were softer דְבָרָ֥יו <S%H1697><s%> his words מִשֶּׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> than oil וְהֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they פְתִחֽוֹת׃ <S%H6609><s%> yet [were] they drawn swords

הַשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <S%H7993><s%> Cast עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> upon the LORD יְהָבְךָ֮ <S%H3053><s%> thy burden וְה֪וּא <S%H1931><s%> and He יְכַ֫לְכְּלֶ֥ךָ <S%H3557><s%> and he shall sustain לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> suffer לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> thee he shall never מ֗וֹט <S%H4131><s%> to be moved לַצַּדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> the righteous

וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> O אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> But thou O God תּוֹרִדֵ֬ם ׀ <S%H3381><s%> shalt bring them down לִבְאֵ֬ר <S%H875><s%> into the pit שַׁ֗חַת <S%H7845><s%> of destruction אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H582><s%> men דָמִ֣ים <S%H1818><s%> bloody וּ֭מִרְמָה <S%H4820><s%> and deceitful לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יֶחֱצ֣וּ <S%H2673><s%> shall not live out half יְמֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3117><s%> their days וַ֝אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I אֶבְטַח־ <S%H982><s%> but I will trust בָּֽךְ׃
